snippet: The success of Italy and the Netherlands in the World Baseball Classic is heartening for Major League Baseball, which hopes to inspire more players through international competition.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that success of Italy and the Netherlands in the World Baseball Classic is heartening for Major League Baseball, which hopes to inspire more players through international competition.
lead_paragraph: The success of Italy and the Netherlands in the World Baseball Classic is heartening for Major League Baseball, which hopes to inspire more players through international competition.

headline.seo: World Baseball Classic — European Showing Broadens Appeal
headline.main: Inspiration in an Imperfect Tournament, by Way of Europe
headline.print_headline: Europe Adds Luster to a Flawed Diamond
